response.description:
Le Vele Apartments is a self-catering accommodations located in Rezzonico. WiFi access is available.

All the apartments will provide you with a TV, private terrace, seating area and a DVD player. There is a full kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with a bath or shower. You can enjoy mountain view. Some of the properties have ironing facilities.

At Le Vele Apartments you will find a garden and a terrace. Other facilities like laundry facilities are offered. The property offers free parking.

Milan Malpensa Airport is located 40 mi away.

Offering a modern wellness area and quality cuisine, this 4-star hotel next to Landaus Ostpark gardens and Jugendstil-Festhalle hall is just a 5-minute walk from the old quarter.

The Parkhotel Landau welcomes you to enjoy its quiet rooms with modern furnishings. All rooms at the hotel are nonsmoking and guests receive a complimentary bottle of mineral water each day.

Take a dip in the attractive hotel pool, relax in the sauna, or stroll through the scenic Ostpark at your doorstep.

Treat yourself in our Brasserie "Wein & Dein" with regional specialties and delicious wine from southern Palatinate.

Featuring an on-site restaurant and lounge this Saskatoon hotel is 2 miles from the Diefenbaker International Airport and 4 miles from The University of Saskatchewan. A Fitness Center, laundry facilities, and business center are also available on-site.

Each air-conditioned room at Quality Inn & Suites Saskatoon includes a cable TV, Keurig coffee maker, mini fridge, and microwave. A private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. Select rooms include a sofa bed.

A daily hot breakfast buffet is served each morning in our Breakfast Bar to all registered guests.

Offering spacious rooms and a family-run atmosphere, Hotel Tyrol is located in the historic center of Ora. It features a Tyrolean restaurant and free parking.

The Tyrol is a 30-minute drive from both the Obereggen and Cermis ski lifts. The Egna-Ora-Termeno exit off the A22 Autostrada del Brennero highway is just one mile away.

Rooms at the peaceful Tyrol Hotel offer a minibar, satellite TV and private bathroom.

A generous breakfast is provided daily, including fruit, yogurt and local cheese and ham. The restaurant serves both regional specialties and international cuisine.

This hotel is set in a modern 17-story building on Berlin's Kurfürstendamm boulevard. The RIU Plaza Berlin is a 5-minute walk from Kurfürstendamm Underground Station and the world-famous KaDeWe department store.

All rooms and suites at the Hotel Riu Plaza Berlin am Kurfürstendamm feature luxury furnishings. Each room includes a flat-screen satellite TV, a safe, fridge, air conditioning and a private bathroom.

High-speed WiFi is provided free of charge for guests in all areas of the hotel. Use of the hotel fitness room is also complimentary. The Hotel Riu Plaza Berlin am Kurfürstendamm also features a 24-hour reception and extensive conference facilities.

The hotel's own restaurant serves a varied breakfast buffet, as well as lunch and dinner à la carte.

The Hotel Riu Plaza Berlin am Kurfürstendamm is 1.9 mi from the Brandenburg Gate, 6.2 mi from Tegel Airport and 14 mi from Schönefeld Airport.
